properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON (BOARDLIKE_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS ='Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT +1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식' AND BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_NAME,CATEGORY,COUNT,CREATE_DATE,RANK()OVER(ORDER BY COUNT DESC,BOARD_NO DESC)AS RANK,COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON BOARD_NO=BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS='Y' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_NAME,CATEGORY,COUNT,CREATE_DATE ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE RANK <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.COUNT , M.NICKNAME , B.CREATE_DATE , B.BOARD_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARDLIKE_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_CNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) ) A WHERE A.BOARD_NAME = '자유 게시판' AND A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.COUNT , M.NICKNAME , B.CREATE_DATE , B.BOARD_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARDLIKE_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_CNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) ) A WHERE A.BOARD_NAME = '자유 게시판' AND A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%')
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '자유 게시판'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM(SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE,COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC,BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE,COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD') GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE,COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD') GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT REPLY_NO,REF_BNO,NICKNAME,REPLY_CONTENT,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO WHERE R.STATUS='Y' AND REPLY_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD') ORDER BY MODIFY_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE,COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD') GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_NAME,COUNT,CREATE_DATE ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '살림 꿀팁'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON (BOARDLIKE_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS ='Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '살림 꿀팁' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON (BOARDLIKE_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS ='Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식' AND (REGION = ? OR CATEGORY = ?) GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) where rownum <= 8
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_WRITER = (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME=?) AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYMMDD')>TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?,'YYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_WRITER = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NAME, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_WRITER = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL,(SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME=?),?,?,?,?,DEFAULT,DEFAULT,?,DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL,SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL,?,?,?,DEFAULT,?,DEFAULT,NULL)
SELECT FILE_NO,REF_BNO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH,FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_NAME,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_NAME,CATEGORY,COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '살림 꿀팁' AND BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME='동네 맛집'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 맛집' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS IMG, COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT A LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON A.REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.FILE_NO IN (SELECT MIN(FILE_NO) FROM ATTACHMENT GROUP BY REF_BNO) GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, A.FILE_PATH, A.CHANGE_NAME, COUNT ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARDLIKE_NO FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ?) ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 사요'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON (BOARDLIKE_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS ='Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 사요' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT +1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 사요' AND BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO FAQ(FAQ_NO ,FAQ_TITLE ,FAQ_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,?)
UPDATE FAQ SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND FAQ_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_TITLE = ? ,FAQ_CONTENT = ? WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 맛집' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND CATEGORY = ? GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT , NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_CONTENT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,NOTICE_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,?)
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ? ,NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT +1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 맛집' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND CATEGORY = ? AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 맛집' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 맛집' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식' AND CATEGORY = ? GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, CATEGORY, B.COUNT, CREATE_DATE, REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, CATEGORY, B.COUNT, CREATE_DATE, REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식' AND CATEGORY = ? AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, CATEGORY, B.COUNT, CREATE_DATE, REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 소식' AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 사요' AND CATEGORY = ? GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, CATEGORY, B.COUNT, CREATE_DATE, REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 사요' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, CATEGORY, B.COUNT, CREATE_DATE, REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 사요' AND CATEGORY = ? AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, CATEGORY, B.COUNT, CREATE_DATE, REGION, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 사요' AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '동네 맛집' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND BOARD_NO=? GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME
SELECT FILE_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL DESC
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME='나눔 할게요'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '나눔 할게요' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '나눔 할게요' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '나눔 할게요' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '나눔 할게요' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND CATEGORY = ? GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '나눔 할게요' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND CATEGORY = ? AND REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME

SELECT BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG",COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO)AS LIKECOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE BL ON BOARD_NO = BOARDLIKE_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON BOARD_NO = REF_BNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NAME = '나눔 할게요' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 AND BOARD_NO=? GROUP BY BOARD_NO,NICKNAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CATEGORY,B.COUNT,CREATE_DATE,REGION,BOARD_REPORT,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(REPLY_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NAME = '같이 해요' AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CATEGORY, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, COUNT(BOARDLIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKE ON (BOARDLIKE_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_NAME = '같이 해요' AND B.STATUS ='Y' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NICKNAME, CATEGORY, CREATE_DATE, COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, NICKNAME, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_NAME = '같이 해요' AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NAME = '같이 해요' AND CATEGORY = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
